Back Main Menu Drink Menu Brunch Menu Dog Treat Menu Gazebo Bar Menu To-Go Wagon Menu Back Plan Your Event Event Spaces Event Menus Event Request Form Back Merch + Sauces Gift Cards Back History The Wagon The WAGON : SWC TO-GO PLACE TO-GO ORDER A NEW CREEKSIDE EXPERIENCE IS HERE! WELCOME TO THE WAGON! Saltwater Cowboys is bringing the flavor outside with , our new to-go food trailer parked right in our lot on Shem Creek, Mount Pleasant, SC. This isn’t your typical Charleston food truck. The Wagon is a permanent extension of our kitchen, serving up your SWC favorites in a relaxed, grab-and-go setting. The Wagon Roll up in your golf cart from nearby neighborhoods, swing by on your way home and pick up a meal for the entire family or stop by in your car and enjoy sandwiches, tacos, wings, and more - quick, fresh Charleston takeout favorites prepared with “to-go” in mind. If you want to hang around and enjoy the SWC vibes, grab a seat on Shem Creek in Mount Pleasant. We’ll have a few picnic tables and plenty of fresh air. It’s the perfect spot to kick back creekside without missing a bite. Meet us at The Wagon! PLACE TO-GO ORDER

Back Main Menu Drink Menu Brunch Menu Dog Treat Menu Gazebo Bar Menu To-Go Wagon Menu Back Plan Your Event Event Spaces Event Menus Event Request Form Back Merch + Sauces Gift Cards Back History The Wagon Drink Menu Raise a glass on Shem Creek with the Saltwater Cowboys drink menu, featuring handcrafted cocktails, frozen drinks, wines, and local beers. From our signature Dockside Lemonade and craft cocktails to regional wines and coastal-inspired favorites, our Mount Pleasant bar is the perfect spot to enjoy waterfront drinks in Charleston. Whether you’re looking for Shem Creek bars with frozen cocktails, local brews, or sunset spritzers, Saltwater Cowboys delivers the ultimate creekside experience. Come sip your favorite drink by the water and see why Saltwater Cowboys is one of the top Shem Creek bars in Mount Pleasant, SC! Our private event menus are served buffet style and built around crowd-pleasing favorites—from smoked meats and seafood to Lowcountry sides and signature starters. With flexible packages and plenty of options to customize, you can build the perfect spread for your group, no matter the size or occasion. to find the perfect location for your next event. Check out our event space Package Options Includes: 2 Appetizers, 1 Entrée, 1 Side Small – $35 per person Includes: 2 Appetizers, 2 Entrées, 2 Sides Medium – $55 per person Includes: 3 Appetizers, 3 Entrées, 3 Sides Large – $70 per person PRIVATE EVENT MENU OPTIONS Appetizers Fried Green Tomatoes – with pimento cheese & strawberry bacon jam Pretzel Bites – choice of queso or horseradish mustard Crispy Brussels Sprouts – tossed in ginger soy with Sriracha aioli Fried Pickles – served with housemade buttermilk ranch Peel & Eat Shrimp – chilled with cocktail sauce & lemon Smoked Wings – buttermilk ranch or blue cheese (add $1 per person for dry rubs: ranch, buffalo, tajin, Old Bay) Nachos – queso, pico, sour cream, jalapeños, black beans Add pulled pork or chicken: +$2 per person Add brisket: +$4 per person BBQ Sliders – pulled pork on Hawaiian rolls Add coleslaw: +$1 per person Desserts Choice of 1 – $3 per person Lemon Squares Assorted Cookie Bites Brownie Bars Entrées Pulled person (choose one): SWC Caesar – romaine, parmesan, cornbread croutons, pickled red onions, Caesar dressing Cowboy Wedge – iceberg, bacon, tomato, cucumber, bleu cheese crumbles, ranch Shem Creek Salad – mixed greens, tomato, cucumber, peppers, pickled onions, cheese Includes: flour tortillas, black beans, pico, cheese, sour cream, cabbage, chipotle aioliServed with chicken and pork Taco Bar – per person Sub shrimp: +$3 per person Sub brisket: +$4 per person Shrimp, sausage, corn, onions, potatoes, Old Bay seasoning, served with cornbread Lowcountry Boil – $30 per person Choice of 3 appetizers (buffet-style) Cocktail Hour – $25 per person Open Bar Packages (2-Hour Duration Only) The Basics – $35 per person House Liquor: vodka, gin, rum, tequila, bourbon Domestic Beer: Bud, Bud From smoked brisket and pulled pork to fried shrimp, tacos, and classic sides, our Charleston waterfront and seafood restaurant serves bold flavors with a laid-back coastal vibe. Whether you’re looking for Shem Creek restaurants with indoor dining or outdoor dockside views, Saltwater Cowboys is the perfect spot to enjoy a true taste of Mount Pleasant. Dine dockside at Saltwater Cowboys and taste why we’re a favorite among Shem Creek restaurants! Our open-air bar serves creekside cocktails, cold beer, and shareable bites like flatbreads, wings, nachos, and tacos. Whether you’re meeting friends for happy hour, enjoying live music, or looking for the best outdoor bar in Mount Pleasant, the Gazebo Bar delivers laid-back vibes and unbeatable waterfront energy. Stop by the Gazebo Bar for the best drinks, food, and Shem Creek sunsets, no reservations needed! Join us every Sunday from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. for a delicious spread of Southern favorites with a Lowcountry twist, including chicken & waffles, breakfast tacos, biscuits, and cinnamon sugar beignets. Pair your plate with a Mimosa Flight or our famous 32oz Bloody Mary Bucket and enjoy the best brunch in Charleston with waterfront views. Join us every Sunday and experience the best brunch on the waterfront at Saltwater Cowboys! Our dog-friendly restaurant and waterfront patio are the perfect spots for pups to relax while you enjoy Southern food and Lowcountry views. With our special Dog Treat Menu, featuring tail-wagging favorites like pup burgers, ice cream cones, and beefy ales, Saltwater Cowboys is Charleston’s go-to dog-friendly dining destination. Bring your four-legged friends and discover why Saltwater Cowboys is the best dog-friendly restaurant on Shem Creek with treats for everyone, even the pups!

As one of the top Shem Creek restaurants, we offer a laid-back Lowcountry dining experience with unbeatable marsh and harbor scenery. Whether you're here for oysters, brisket, happy hour, or a night out with friends, our authentic flavors, , and friendly crew make Saltwater Cowboys a favorite for locals and visitors looking for Charleston’s best seafood and BBQ on the water. historic Shem Creek seafood cold cocktails unforgettable sunset views live music LATEST SWC UPDATES Jan 16, 2026 5 Reasons To Visit Shem Creek This Winter Jan 16, 2026 Shem Creek dining is here all year.
